item.description:
Studio shoot with Natallia

 

***

*** this shoot sold out quickly, so we're going to try to add two more spots.

*** please be patient while we work out the mechanics for doing this on meetup.com

***

 

Natallia is a member of the Greater Boston Studio & Glamour Photography meetup and an experienced fashion model.

Here is an opportunity to improve your studio & glamour photography skills and add to your portfolio.  Natallia will be modeling a couple of different outfits.   The fee must be paid in advance. To ensure each attendee has enough time to shoot, we are limiting this event to 7 photographers.

We'll do an open format workshop with an overview version of Carlton's popular studio lighting tutorial.  It's always good to go over the basics of studio lighting and setting up backdrops.

Carlton will cover:

1. High key setup
2. Low key setup
3. Light modifiers such as the soft box, beauty dish, grids, gels, and scrim.
4. Ring flash lighting

Notes:

- You may bring your own Pocket Wizard, but only one photographer can use the lights at a time.

- Please remember to charge your camera batteries the evening before. Please be sure to bring sufficient memory cards.

You can see more recent photos of Natallia at

http://www.flickr.com/photos/eds-pix/sets/72157632344455707/

and

http://www.modelclubinc.com/profile.php?MC_division=women&MC_name=natallia_d

You can see more about Carlton's tutorial at

http://www.meetup.com/Greater-Boston-Studio-Photography/events/81751092/

Hope to see you there !!!

The meetup event fee is $45, which covers instruction, studio rental, and model's fee.
item.how_to_find_us: Rt 4/225 in Bedford. Exit 31B from I-95. Head west on 4/225 (it's bedford road in lexington, great road in bedford) towards bedford. 4th traffic light, turn right into the parking lot for 200 Great Road.
item.name: Photo shoot with Natallia
